sentences: Peter Jørgensen Gram (25 November 1881 – 4 February 1956) was a Danish composer and organist.
Gram was born in Copenhagen and studied at the Leipzig Conservatory under Stephan Krehl, Arthur Nikisch and Hans Sitt.
From 1908, he worked as a conductor in Copenhagen, and from 1918 to 1932, he led the performances of the Dansk Koncertforening.
From 1937 to 1951 he was Director of Music at the Danish Broadcasting Corporation.
